artist: Designer: William Ernst Hentschel; Manufacturer: Rookwood Pottery
creditline: Gift of Marion and Lila Nelson
description: blue and pink glaze with 8 Art Nouveau-style applied and incised flowers; body flares out to wide base; slightly domed lid
markings: \'R [backwards] P\' with radiating lines, stamped on bottom; \'X/770/V\', stamped, below logo; \'WEH\', incised, on bottom; \'259\', in red, on bottom
object_name: Sugar Bowl, from a tea set
title: Sugar Bowl, from a tea set
